page.title: 13A Day in My Life A.Mitchell
page.content: At{Christmas}I looked in my stocking in the middle of the night, but it was empty. Then I fell back to sleep and in the morning there were many things brought by Father Christmas. I took my stocking into Mummy and Daddy's room to open it. There was a tape recorder, a computer, a chocolate orange, a box of games and some Lego. More presents were downstairs under the Christmas tree. We went to{Church}and sang Carols. The Church looked beautiful with candles, flowers and Holly. Back home we had a special lunch with roast turkey and potatoes, cranberry sauce, broccoli, parsnips and lots more. For dessert we had Christmas pudding (we ate too much). After lunch we opened the presents under the tree and went for a walk. We had mince pies for tea and I stayed up late playing with my new toys.
